video.name: SWEET POTATO PIE BARS | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Vegan Sweet Potato Pie Bars. Spiced Sweet Potato Pie layered over cinnamony Snickerdoodle crust. 
ðŸ’™ðŸ§¡FULL RECIPE HERE: https://www.veganricha.com/2017/10/vegan-sweet-potato-pie-bars.html
ðŸ’™ðŸ§¡ BUY MY COOKBOOK: https://veganricha.com/vrekaz

These sweet potato pie bars are easy and great for any season and the holidays. The crust is a simple cinnamony flour and sugar mixture pressed together and prebaked. It reminds me of Snickerdoodle cookies and works amazingly. 

These delicious bars can be served as is or with whipped coconut cream or ice cream. This recipe makes just the right amount to treat before the main event. Double it up and bake into a pie! These can be easily made with pumpkin or other squash puree. Gluten-free option

recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup flour (, I use unbleached white. Use oat flour or gluten-free blend to make gluten-free)
3.5 tbsp coconut sugar ( or use any fine grain sugar of choice)
2.5 to 3 tbsp oil (, organic safflower or other neutral)
1 1/4 cup sweet potato puree (, or use pure pumpkin puree)
5 tsp starch (, cornstarch or arrowroot starch)
1 tsp pumpkin pie spice (, or use 1/2 tsp cinnamon, 1/4 tsp ground ginger, 1/4 tsp nutmeg, a pinch of cloves)
1 tbsp oil (, organic safflower or other neutral)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Line a loaf pan with parchment such that the parchment strip is hanging over the edge (see pics). Make the Crust: Add all the ingredients except oil in a bowl and mix well. Add 2 tbsp of oil and mix in with a spoon or your hand. Add more oil a tsp at a time to mix in until the crust starts to stick to make fat crumbs.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Line a loaf pan with parchment such that the parchment strip is hanging over the edge (see pics). Make the Crust: Add all the ingredients except oil in a bowl and mix well. Add 2 tbsp of oil and mix in with a spoon or your hand. Add more oil a tsp at a time to mix in until the crust starts to stick to make fat crumbs.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer mixture to the loaf pan (a stoneware or glass pan works better to keep the crust more shortbread like and reduce overbrowning). Press it down to form a well packed and even crust. Bake for 8 to 10 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer mixture to the loaf pan (a stoneware or glass pan works better to keep the crust more shortbread like and reduce overbrowning). Press it down to form a well packed and even crust. Bake for 8 to 10 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix everything under the sweet potato layer until well combined. Pour over the baked crust. Bake for 35 to 45 minutes until the top is well set.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix everything under the sweet potato layer until well combined. Pour over the baked crust. Bake for 35 to 45 minutes until the top is well set.

recipeInstructions.text: Let it cool for 15 minutes, then gently remove from the pan. Chill for atleast an hour before slicing. Longer chilling time (a few hours) makes for a better set top and much more spiced and buttery flavor profile. Serve as is or with a dollop of vegan vanilla ice cream or whipped coconut cream and a dusting of pumpkin pie spice.
recipeInstructions.name: Let it cool for 15 minutes, then gently remove from the pan. Chill for atleast an hour before slicing. Longer chilling time (a few hours) makes for a better set top and much more spiced and buttery flavor profile. Serve as is or with a dollop of vegan vanilla ice cream or whipped coconut cream and a dusting of pumpkin pie spice.
